channel.title: Crathoz 742
channel.description:
[CENTER] [SIZE=7][B][FONT=Arial Black]Crathoz 742[/FONT][/B][/SIZE]
[B]Why Crathoz?[/B] You should join crathoz if you like skilling, bossing and economy. Here on Crathoz, we care about the players. We will listen to suggestions and add content that the players want to see. We will be making polls for content on the forums, the piece of content with most votes, will be worked on. Updates will come whenever they're ready.
[SIZE=5][B]Features[/B][/SIZE] Great Skilling Great Combat Great Bosses All 25 Skills Custom Dungeoneering Prestige System With Shop Full Herblore Full Agility with 3 courses Full Firemaking Full Woodcutting Full Fishing Full Cooking Full Crafting Full Thieving Full Mining Full Smithing Full Hunter Full Summoning Full Godwars 1 Wave jad Full Fight kiln Clue Scrolls Dominion tower Barrows Full duel arena Castle wars Warriors guild Livid farm Ice Strykes Jadinkos Polypore dungeon Glacors Tormented demons Queen black dragon King black dragon Corporeal Beast Dagganoth Kings Yk'lagor the thunderous Nomad Avatar Ice troll king Mutant tarn Giant mole Giant roc Great pk areas Red portal White portal Clan wars
[SIZE=5][B]Donator Benefits[/B][/SIZE] [B][SIZE=4]Donator Zone[/SIZE][/B] Rune Rocks Furnace and anvil Trolls to train on Kalphite lair Magic trees
[SIZE=4][B]Normal Donator[/B][/SIZE] Access to pet shop Ability to change name color Access to donator store Access to potion flasks
[SIZE=4][B]Extreme Donator[/B][/SIZE] Noted ores in shop Noted flasks in shop Access to Bork
[SIZE=5][B]Custom Boss: Blink[/B][/SIZE] [SIZE=4][B]Special Attack[/B][/SIZE] Blink randomly launches a special attack. This attack damages 5000 hitpoints spread equally to the players fighting. This single attack makes blink impossible to solo, you will need atleast 5 players to slay him.
[SIZE=5][B]Custom Boss: Avatar[/B][/SIZE] [SIZE=4][B]Special Attack: Poison Storm[/B][/SIZE] Avatar will randomly poison you. This poison hits 500 damage each time! Be sure to bring antipoison. [SIZE=4][B]Special Attack: Bleed[/B][/SIZE] Avatar will also make you bleed, over a period of 2 seconds, you will be damaged 500 hitpoints. This attack is sure dangerous.

[IMG]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/503x327q50/855/zas9.png[/img][IMG]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/517x160q90/31/2sjm.png[/img][IMG]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/504x325q90/703/aqkp.png[/img][IMG]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/506x324q90/33/muof.png[/img][IMG]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/504x328q90/28/atbv.png[/img][IMG]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/501x327q90/31/w84m.png[/img][IMG]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/506x326q90/716/h6jz.png[/img][IMG]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/505x329q90/560/z1gj.png[/img][IMG]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/504x328q90/835/5meg.png[/img][IMG]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/506x327q90/855/fooa.png[/img][IMG]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/501x325q90/69/4xay.png[/img][IMG]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/502x328q90/69/s6ub.png[/img][IMG]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/502x324q90/845/tvxn.png[/img][IMG]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/503x327q90/27/jto6.png[/img][IMG]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/504x325q90/560/7ijm.png[/img][IMG]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/631x410q90/69/goos.png[/img][IMG]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/505x327q90/33/g731.png[/img][IMG]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/500x326q90/594/tu5q.png[/img][IMG]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/503x325q90/41/m8qd.png[/img][IMG]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/504x328q90/42/emm3.png[/img][IMG]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/594x456q90/812/5asb.png[/img][IMG]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/985x687q90/62/gnit.png[/img][IMG]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/565x450q90/24/2ire.png[/img] item.title: Crathoz 742
item.dc:creator: @Crathoz Crathoz
item.description:
@Crathoz wrote:

[CENTER]
[SIZE=7][B][FONT=Arial Black]Crathoz 742[/FONT][/B][/SIZE]

[B]Why Crathoz?[/B]
You should join crathoz if you like skilling, bossing and economy. Here on Crathoz, we care about the players. We will listen to suggestions and add content that the players want to see.
We will be making polls for content on the forums, the piece of content with most votes, will be worked on. Updates will come whenever they’re ready.

[SIZE=5][B]Features[/B][/SIZE]
Great Skilling
Great Combat
Great Bosses
All 25 Skills
Custom Dungeoneering
Prestige System With Shop
Full Herblore
Full Agility with 3 courses
Full Firemaking
Full Woodcutting
Full Fishing
Full Cooking
Full Crafting
Full Thieving
Full Mining
Full Smithing
Full Hunter
Full Summoning
Full Godwars
1 Wave jad
Full Fight kiln
Clue Scrolls
Dominion tower
Barrows
Full duel arena
Castle wars
Warriors guild
Livid farm
Ice Strykes
Jadinkos
Polypore dungeon
Glacors
Tormented demons
Queen black dragon
King black dragon
Corporeal Beast
Dagganoth Kings
Yk’lagor the thunderous
Nomad
Avatar
Ice troll king
Mutant tarn
Giant mole
Giant roc
Great pk areas
Red portal
White portal
Clan wars

[SIZE=5][B]Donator Benefits[/B][/SIZE]
[B][SIZE=4]Donator Zone[/SIZE][/B]
Rune Rocks
Furnace and anvil
Trolls to train on
Kalphite lair
Magic trees

[SIZE=4][B]Normal Donator[/B][/SIZE]
Access to pet shop
Ability to change name color
Access to donator store
Access to potion flasks

[SIZE=4][B]Extreme Donator[/B][/SIZE]
Noted ores in shop
Noted flasks in shop
Access to Bork

[SIZE=5][B]Custom Boss: Blink[/B][/SIZE]
[SIZE=4][B]Special Attack[/B][/SIZE]
Blink randomly launches a special attack. This attack damages 5000 hitpoints spread equally to the players fighting.
This single attack makes blink impossible to solo, you will need atleast 5 players to slay him.

[SIZE=5][B]Custom Boss: Avatar[/B][/SIZE]
[SIZE=4][B]Special Attack: Poison Storm[/B][/SIZE]
Avatar will randomly poison you. This poison hits 500 damage each time! Be sure to bring antipoison.
[SIZE=4][B]Special Attack: Bleed[/B][/SIZE]
Avatar will also make you bleed, over a period of 2 seconds, you will be damaged 500 hitpoints. This attack is sure dangerous.

[/spoiler]
